titles.title: Small Businesses Partnering with National Labs Act of 2019
Small Businesses Partnering with National Labs Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to require the establishment of a small business voucher program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Small Businesses Partnering with National Labs Act of 2019
This bill directs the Department of Energy to establish a program to provide qualified small business concerns with vouchers that may be used at National Laboratories and single-purpose research facilities for activities such as research and development.
In addition, the bill authorizes the Department of the Treasury to locate and recover unclaimed U.S. government assets on behalf of any agency and to retain a portion thereof to cover administrative and operational costs.
